Cam::
She took off in a dead run towards the forest. She went running 
wildly around some of the trees, smelling the drones.  She saw one 
and went running up to it. It sped off through the trees and found 
another hiding spot.  She stopped and thought about what happened. 
She tried to sneek up on a drone. She was about to pounce on one, 
then it senced her and flew off.  She was starting to get a little 
discouraged. She started scouting around, looking for another drone.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: You have to get all the drones to the ground, but beware!
> if they hear you coming, they'll flee away. You'll have to be 
sneaky.
> 
> He pressed a button on the wall monitor and five small drones exited
> the base and went into hiding in the forest.
> 
> Blackfang: Let's play then!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > Cam::
> > 
> > She hopped around in fox mode. "Yeah. I can play that. How do I 
play 
> > it again? Catch all the drones? Sounds great. Let's play then."  
and 
> > with that, she took off like a shot down the hallway and towards 
the 
> > main enterence.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Oops! I forgot Blackfang yesterday!
> > > 
> > > Bic:
> > > 
> > > Blackfang tought for a moment. He wanted to make her play but 
also 
> > to
> > > train her. How could he do both? Then, it dawned on him.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: That could be a great idea. I have a great game in 
mind.
> > > Let's call it "Catch the drone". I'll send five drones in the 
forest
> > > and you'll have to capture them. How about it?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > Cam::
> > > > 
> > > > She transformed into fox kit mode and started to nip at 
> > Blackfang's 
> > > > heels. "Wanna play?"
